title: Curried Carrot and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 large onion, diced', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '4 large carrots, sliced', '5 new potatoes, quartered', '475ml vegetable stock', '2 teaspoons grated fresh ginger', '1 teaspoon curry powder', 'salt and pepper to taste']
